## initial popdens zip data

```{r}
library (piggyback)
pb_track (c ("accra/popdens/*.zip", "kathmandu/popdens/*zip"))
pb_push (repo = "ATFutures/who-data", tag = "worldpop-zip-gha-npl")
```

## convert to tif format

```{r}
devtools::load_all (".", export_all = FALSE)
crop_worldpop_tif (city = "accra")
crop_worldpop_tif (city = "kathmandu")
pb_track (c ("accra/popdens/*.zip", "kathmandu/popdens/*zip",
             "accra/popdens/*.tif", "kathmandu/popdens/*.tif"))
pb_push (repo = "ATFutures/who-data", tag = "worldpop-tif-gha-npl")
```
